posts.post_title: T210 TRADE +++ My Series 1 for Your 2-8
posts.post_content:
I have 17 T210-1 cards that I'd like to trade for any other series.

Of course there's a wide array of toughness and condition out there.  However, I'm sure ;) we can work out almost anything.

Augusta
Bagwell
Hauser
McMahon
Norcum

Columbia
Schwietzka

Columbus
Bensen
Lewis
Radebaugh
Toren

Macon
Enbanks
Eubank
Ison

Savannah
Howard
Martina
Pelkey
Petit
Sweeney


Let's see what we can do:   [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]


Thanks, Scott
